block.p: American League DETROIT -- Placed DH Dmitri Young on the 15- day disabled list. Purchased the contract of OF Andres Torres from Toledo of the IL. KANSAS CITY -- Placed INF Desi Relaford on the 15-day DL. Called up LHP Jaime Cerda from Omaha of the PCL. MINNESOTA -- Placed C Joe Mauer on the 15- day DL. Purchased the contract of RHP Seth Greisinger from Rochester of the IL. Designated RHP Micheal Nakamura for assignment. TAMAP BAY -- Sent OF Charles Gipson outright to Durham of the IL. TEXAS -- Signed OF Gary Matthews, Jr. to a minor league contract. Released OF Jason Tyner.

American League DETROIT -- Placed DH Dmitri Young on the 15- day disabled list. Purchased the contract of OF Andres Torres from Toledo of the IL. KANSAS CITY -- Placed INF Desi Relaford on the 15-day DL. Called up LHP Jaime Cerda from Omaha of the PCL. MINNESOTA -- Placed C Joe Mauer on the 15- day DL. Purchased the contract of RHP Seth Greisinger from Rochester of the IL. Designated RHP Micheal Nakamura for assignment. TAMAP BAY -- Sent OF Charles Gipson outright to Durham of the IL. TEXAS -- Signed OF Gary Matthews, Jr. to a minor league contract. Released OF Jason Tyner.
National League PITTSBURGH -- Assigned INF Terry Shumpert to Nashville of the PCL.

National Basketball Association LEAGUE--Fined Memphis F James Posey $7,500 for kicking a ball into the stands during an April 5 game against Utah. CHICAGO -- Placed G Kendall Gill on the injured list. Activated F Chris Jefferies from the injured list. SEATTLE -- Signed F Leon Smith to a 10-day contract. TORONTO -- Activated G Roger Mason Jr. from the injured list. Placed G Rod Strickland on the injured list.
Women's National Basketball Association DETROIT SHOCK -- Signed G Jae Cross. Resigned G-F Stacey Thomas.

GIANTS -- Signed DT Norman Hand to a twoyear contract. Re-signed DE Keith Washington. CLEVELAND -- Announced the resignation of Carmen Policy, president and chief executive officer, effective May 1. Named John Collins president and chief executive officer. OAKLAND -- Signed WR Chris Cole.
World TeamTennis NEWPORT BEACH BREAKERS -- Announced Lindsay Davenport will not return to the team for the 2004 season.
